NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: We have never before attempted landing on a quantum celestial body.. As the expedition date approaches, my.. My confidence wanes. 2 1 COLEUS: Our instruments appear unable to receive any data to allow us to probe into its mysterious interior, and its thick clouds obscure our sight from anything within. 3 2 COLEUS: What dangers could lie in wait in those clouds? Would we.. even be able to sense where we are in the solar system? 4 3 COLEUS: And when it disappears... Would we disappear with it? 5 3 COLEUS: I have my friends, and Plume and Phlox will be watching for us from afar. I have faith.. Even if we disappear, they will find us. 6 5 COLEUS: And if we were to disappear, it would at least be in the pursuit of knowledge. I hope to become one with the universe.
